languages.text: "О, нет. Сначала я тебя выпотрошу на глазах твоих гвардейцев, а потом я хочу посмотреть на это местное подобие Арбитес. И я спрошу их: почему, раздери меня бездна, всякий сброд смеет говорить об арбитрах иначе как с ужасом и почтением?"

"Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"
languages.original_text: "О, нет. Сначала я тебя выпотрошу на глазах твоих гвардейцев, а потом я хочу посмотреть на это местное подобие Арбитес. И я спрошу их: почему, раздери меня бездна, всякий сброд смеет говорить об арбитрах иначе как с ужасом и почтением?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh no. First I will disembowel you in front of your guardsmen, then I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the abyss's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

"Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

"Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

languages.text: «Oh, no. Primero, lo destriparé delante de sus hombres. Después, me gustaría ver lo que supuestamente representa al Arbites aquí. Debo preguntarles por qué, en el nombre del vacío, osa el populacho hablar de los Arbitrator con algo distinto a la veneración temerosa».
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, no. Primero, lo destriparé delante de sus hombres. Después, me gustaría ver lo que supuestamente representa al Arbites aquí. Debo preguntarles por qué, en el nombre del vacío, osa el populacho hablar de los Arbitrator con algo distinto a la veneración temerosa».

languages.text: “噢，那可不行。首先，我要当着所有帝国卫队的面，把你开膛破肚。在这之后，我要看看这边的法务部到底是怎么回事。我打算以虚空的名义问问他们：为什么这里的乌合之众胆敢对法务官指指点点？为什么他们没有心怀敬畏？”
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，那可不行。首先，我要当着所有帝国卫队的面，把你开膛破肚。在这之后，我要看看这边的法务部到底是怎么回事。我打算以虚空的名义问问他们：为什么这里的乌合之众胆敢对法务官指指点点？为什么他们没有心怀敬畏？”

languages.text: 「あぁ、だめだ。まず、ガーズマンの前で貴様の臓物を取り除くつもりだ。それから、裁定局へのどんな通行証があるのか見せてもらいたい。彼らにこう尋ねるだろう―どうしてヴォイドの名前でゴミが尊敬で恐れおののくこともなくアービトレイターの話をしているんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、だめだ。まず、ガーズマンの前で貴様の臓物を取り除くつもりだ。それから、裁定局へのどんな通行証があるのか見せてもらいたい。彼らにこう尋ねるだろう―どうしてヴォイドの名前でゴミが尊敬で恐れおののくこともなくアービトレイターの話をしているんだ？」

languages.text: « Au risque de vous décevoir, ça n'arrivera pas. Pour commencer, je vais vous éventrer sous les yeux de vos hommes. Ensuite, j'aurai une petite conversation avec ceux qui sont censés représenter l'Arbites sur cette planète. Ils pourront peut-être me dire pourquoi de viles canailles osent évoquer l'ordre sacré des arbitrators autrement qu'en serviteurs dociles et soumis. »
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: « Au risque de vous décevoir, ça n'arrivera pas. Pour commencer, je vais vous éventrer sous les yeux de vos hommes. Ensuite, j'aurai une petite conversation avec ceux qui sont censés représenter l'Arbites sur cette planète. Ils pourront peut-être me dire pourquoi de viles canailles osent évoquer l'ordre sacré des arbitrators autrement qu'en serviteurs dociles et soumis. »

languages.text: "Hayır. Önce Muhafızlarının önünde bağırsaklarını deşeceğim. Sonra da buradaki sözüm ona Yargıcıların ne olduğunu göreceğiz. Onlara şunu soracağım: Uçsuz adına bu ayaktakımı nasıl olur da Yargıcılardan dehşet dolu bir hürmetle bahsetmez?"
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Önce Muhafızlarının önünde bağırsaklarını deşeceğim. Sonra da buradaki sözüm ona Yargıcıların ne olduğunu göreceğiz. Onlara şunu soracağım: Uçsuz adına bu ayaktakımı nasıl olur da Yargıcılardan dehşet dolu bir hürmetle bahsetmez?"

languages.text: "Oh, nein. Vorher werde ich Euch vor Euren Gardisten ausweiden. Dann möchte ich sehen, was für die Arbites hier gilt. Ich werde sie folgendes fragen: Warum im Namen der Leere wagt es Gesindel, von Arbitratoren mit etwas anderem als entsetzter Hochachtung zu reden?"
languages.original_text: "Oh no. First, I will disembowel you in front of your Guardsmen. Then, I'd like to see what passes for the Arbites around here. I will ask them this: why in the void's name does rabble dare to speak of Arbitrators with anything other than terrified reverence?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, nein. Vorher werde ich Euch vor Euren Gardisten ausweiden. Dann möchte ich sehen, was für die Arbites hier gilt. Ich werde sie folgendes fragen: Warum im Namen der Leere wagt es Gesindel, von Arbitratoren mit etwas anderem als entsetzter Hochachtung zu reden?"
